comment: A function mapping to a scalar product in which one factor is finitely supported is finitely supported. Formerly part of proof for ~ ply1coe . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 8-Aug-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 18-Oct-2019.)
